comments:
While trying to restart my workbench I ran into a couple of
exceptions (I thought I've properly shutdown eclipse, but I'm
not really sure anymore).

In addition to the problems below, what was really bad was that
eclipse didn't come-up at all and I had to delete the workbench.xml
from the .metadata folder. After that I could restart my workbench again.
Usually the workbench can recover from such exceptions and just ignores the
workbench.xml.

I've attached the workbench.xml that has caused the problem.
